page.title: 12HOME LIFE IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {SCHOOL DAY}On a typical school day, the average child rises between 7.30 & 7.45 a.m.& breakfasts mainly on either cereal or toast.Approx 50% of children walk to school;remainder travel mostly by family car,bicycle,or occasionally by bus or taxi.Very few children (probably less than 5%)go home to lunch,most bringing sandwiches;15%-20% buy a{SCHOOL LUNCH}which costs 70p. Children return home at 3.15p.m.or stay on later to take part in School clubs and activities.Most have cooked family meal in evening,then go out to play,watch T.V.,or if of Secondary age,do homework.{BEDTIME}of average 9yr old between 9 and 10p.m.,the later time mostly at weekends. {WEEKENDS}some children taken out by parents,especially visiting relatives or shopping at out-of-area shops. {PETS:CATS & DOGS}most popular.
